titles.title: RS650 God with humanity made one

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God with humanity made one
is seen in Christ, God's only Son:
in you, Lord Christ, the Son of Man,
we see God's reconciling plan.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To save a broken world you came,
and from chaotic depths reclaim
your whole creation, so we share
your reconciling work and care.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In you all humankind can see
the people God would have us be.
In you we find how God forgives,
through you, the Spirit in us lives.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Through us God calls the world again;
and constantly his love remains
with arms outstretched, to heal and bless
the refugees of emptiness

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Where race or creed or hate divide,
the Church, like God, must stand beside
and stretch out reconciling hands
to join, through suffering, every land.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Then give us strength, great Lord of life,
to work until all human strife
is reconciled, and all shall praise
your endless love, your glorious ways
